column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////On to the experience
column5: dark and just all around my kind of steak place. The music is perfect the lighting is dark but once your eyes adjust
column6: perfect as well. I'm already digging the vibe & the evening gets even better when our server John introduces himself
column7: walks us through what Bavettes is about
column8: specials and a few suggestions for us to ponder. We immediately took to John
